description: This is a modern dashboard for the Trivy Operator from Aqua Security. Made to take advantage of the latest Grafana features. GitHub repository: https://github.com/dotdc/grafana-dashboards-kubernetes

panels.title: Vulnerability count per image and severity in $namespace namespace(s)

targets.expr: sum(trivy_vulnerability_id{vuln_id=~"CVE.*", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (namespace, image_registry, image_repository, image_tag, vuln_id, severity)

panels.title: Total config audit report by namespaces
Total config audit report by severity

title: Trivy Operator - Vulnerabilities
